001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
004
005import com.technototes.library.command.Command;
006import com.technototes.library.command.CommandScheduler;
007
008/** Class for gamepad-command integration
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 * @param <T> The type of Gamepad Button
011 */
012public interface CommandInput<T extends ButtonBase> extends BooleanSupplier {
013
014    default T whenPressed(Command command) {
015        return schedule(getInstance()::isJustPressed, command);
016    }
017
018    default T whenReleased(Command command) {
019        return schedule(getInstance()::isJustReleased, command);
020    }
021
022    default T whilePressed(Command command) {
023        return schedule(getInstance()::isPressed, command.cancelUpon(getInstance()::isReleased));
024    }
025
026    default T whileReleased(Command command) {
027        return schedule(getInstance()::isReleased, command.cancelUpon(getInstance()::isPressed));
028    }
029
030    default T whilePressedOnce(Command command) {
031        return schedule(getInstance()::isJustPressed, command.cancelUpon(getInstance()::isReleased));
032    }
033
034    default T whilePressedContinuous(Command command) {
035        return schedule(getInstance()::isPressed, command);
036    }
037
038    default T whileReleasedOnce(Command command) {
039        return schedule(getInstance()::isJustReleased, command.cancelUpon(getInstance()::isPressed));
040    }
041
042    default T whenToggled(Command command) {
043        return schedule(getInstance()::isJustToggled, command);
044    }
045
046    default T whenInverseToggled(Command command) {
047        return schedule(getInstance()::isJustInverseToggled, command);
048    }
049
050    default T whileToggled(Command command) {
051        return schedule(getInstance()::isToggled, command.cancelUpon(getInstance()::isInverseToggled));
052    }
053
054    default T whileInverseToggled(Command command) {
055        return schedule(getInstance()::isInverseToggled, command.cancelUpon(getInstance()::isToggled));
056    }
057
058    /** Return instance of class parameter
059     *
060     * @return The instance
061     */
062    T getInstance();
063
064    /** Schedule the commands
065     *
066     * @param condition The condition
067     * @param command The command to schedule
068     * @return The instance
069     */
070    default T schedule(BooleanSupplier condition, Command command) {
071        CommandScheduler.getInstance().scheduleJoystick(command, condition);
072        return getInstance();
073    }
074
075    /** just schedules things
076     *
077     * @param command command
078     * @return the instance
079     */
080    default T schedule(Command command) {
081        return schedule(() -> true, command);
082    }
083
084    default T whenPressedReleased(Command press, Command release) {
085        whenPressed(press);
086        return whenReleased(release);
087    }
088
089    default T whilePressedReleased(Command press, Command release) {
090        whilePressed(press);
091        return whileReleased(release);
092    }
093
094    default T toggle(Command toggle, Command itoggle) {
095        whenToggled(toggle);
096        return whenInverseToggled(itoggle);
097    }
098}
